function.name: end_conversation
function.description:
Call ONLY when conversation reaches clear end state by both sides exchanging farewell messages or one side explicitly stating they want to end the conversation.

DO NOT CALL if:
- Still negotiating/discussing
- Questions pending
- No explicit end statement
- Just discussing options

Must have clear evidence in final messages.

reason.description: The specific reason why the conversation must end, which should directly reference one of the conditions listed above

who_ended_conversation.description: Who initiated the conversation ending. Must be supported by clear evidence in the conversation.

final_messages.description: Last 1-2 messages showing clear end reason

termination_type.description: Whether successful completion or early termination
